homepage.hero_title: Build beautiful and performant React apps with ease
homepage.hero_description: Our component library empowers developers with customizable, accessible UI elements optimized for React ecosystems.
homepage.ready_to_use: Ready to use in your projects
homepage.features_description: Lightweight and fast components, designed specifically for React applications.
homepage.themes_description: Supports effortless customization with light, dark, and custom themes.
homepage.apis_description: Simple, intuitive props enabling full control over your components.
homepage.documentation_description: Comprehensive, clear documentation to ease your development experience.
homepage.simple_card_description: Clean, minimal card with action support.
homepage.feature_card_description: Highlight your app's features with style.
homepage.getting_started_step_1_description: Install with npm or yarn for easy integration.
homepage.getting_started_step_2_description: Import only what you need from the library to keep bundles small.
homepage.getting_started_step_3_description: Apply components directly with easy-to-use props.
